name: City center
uniques: Ensures a minimum tile yield of [+2 Food, +1 Production]
Grants [Rejuvenation] ([all healing effects doubled]) to adjacent [{Military} {Land}] units for the rest of the game
Grants [Plague] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [100]% chance> <before the [Industrial era]>
Grants [Covid] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [1]% chance> <after the [Informaton era]>
Grants [Tetanus] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [2]% chance> <before the [Modern era]>
Grants [Obesity] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [4]% chance> <after the [Atomic era]>
Grants [HIV] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [3]% chance>
Grants [Syphilis] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [3]% chance>
Grants [Flu] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [1]% chance>
Grants [Autism] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [3]% chance>
Grants [Hypertension] ([Disease mod by hachchch]) to adjacent [All] units for the rest of the game <with [5]% chance> <after the [Industrial era]>

civilopediaText.text: Marks the center of a city
Appearance changes with the technological era of the owning civilization
